availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Early (Wealthy Jefferson County farmer and physician)

body.p: Residence: Middletown post office, Jefferson County, Kentucky. A wealthy Virginia-born physician and farmer. Son of Whitfield Early and Mary Rucker Minor. Married Adeline F. Rogers. Father of Mary Vesta Early, Alva S. Early, Cora I. Early, and Roger Randolph Early.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, Middletown post office, p. 85.

Find A Grave, Entry for Dr Joseph Early (1800-1871), Find A Grave Memorial # 61630409, Lexington Cemetery, Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=EA&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=2041&GRid=61630409& (accessed 9 Aug 2017).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 166B.
